languages.text: Тайна культа Последнего восхода, скрытая в недрах Кьявы Гамма, была раскрыта. Проклятая машина, вычисляющая грядущее на крови невинных, была уничтожена, а демон, питающий ее свой злобой — убит.

The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.
languages.original_text: Тайна культа Последнего восхода, скрытая в недрах Кьявы Гамма, была раскрыта. Проклятая машина, вычисляющая грядущее на крови невинных, была уничтожена, а демон, питающий ее свой злобой — убит.

traits.locale_text: The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.

The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.

languages.text: 行商浪人已经揭开了“终末黎明”邪教隐藏在基亚瓦伽马星深处的秘密，摧毁了那台依靠无辜者的鲜血来计算未来的邪恶机器，杀死了为那台机器注入恨意、提供动力的恶魔。
languages.original_text: The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人已经揭开了“终末黎明”邪教隐藏在基亚瓦伽马星深处的秘密，摧毁了那台依靠无辜者的鲜血来计算未来的邪恶机器，杀死了为那台机器注入恨意、提供动力的恶魔。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマの奥深くに隠されていた、最後の夜明け教団の秘密が暴かれた。罪のない人々の血を使って未来を計算する呪われた機械は破壊され、機械に悪意を注ぐディーモンも殺された。
languages.original_text: The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマの奥深くに隠されていた、最後の夜明け教団の秘密が暴かれた。罪のない人々の血を使って未来を計算する呪われた機械は破壊され、機械に悪意を注ぐディーモンも殺された。

languages.text: El secreto del Culto del Amanecer Final, oculto en las profundidades de Kiava Gamma, ha salido a la luz. La máquina maldita, que calculaba el futuro usando la sangre de los inocentes, ha sido destruida y el daemon cuya maldad la impulsaba ha muerto.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.

traits.locale_text: El secreto del Culto del Amanecer Final, oculto en las profundidades de Kiava Gamma, ha salido a la luz. La máquina maldita, que calculaba el futuro usando la sangre de los inocentes, ha sido destruida y el daemon cuya maldad la impulsaba ha muerto.

languages.text: Der in den Tiefen von Kiava Gamma versteckte Geheimkult der letzten Dämmerung wurde entdeckt. Die verfluchte Maschine, mit mit dem Blut von Unschuldigen die Zukunft berechnete, wurde zerstört, und der Dämon, der die Maschine mit seiner Bosheit genährt hatte, ist tot.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.

traits.locale_text: Der in den Tiefen von Kiava Gamma versteckte Geheimkult der letzten Dämmerung wurde entdeckt. Die verfluchte Maschine, mit mit dem Blut von Unschuldigen die Zukunft berechnete, wurde zerstört, und der Dämon, der die Maschine mit seiner Bosheit genährt hatte, ist tot.

languages.text: Le secret du Culte de l'Aube finale, enseveli dans les profondeurs de Kiava Gamma, a été révélé. La machine maudite, qui prédisait l'avenir à partir du sang des innocents, a été détruite, et le démon qui alimentait la machine de sa malfaisance a été tué.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.

traits.locale_text: Le secret du Culte de l'Aube finale, enseveli dans les profondeurs de Kiava Gamma, a été révélé. La machine maudite, qui prédisait l'avenir à partir du sang des innocents, a été détruite, et le démon qui alimentait la machine de sa malfaisance a été tué.

languages.text: Kiava Gama'nın derinliklerinde gizlenen Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın gizemi ortaya çıktı. Masumların kanını kullanarak geleceği hesaplayan lanetli makine yok edildi ve makineyi besleyen iblis, melanetiyle birlikte öldürüldü.
languages.original_text: The secret of the Cult of the Final Dawn, hidden deep within Kiava Gamma, was revealed. The cursed machine, which calculated the future using the blood of innocents, was destroyed, and the daemon fueling the machine with its malice was killed.
